1.name: Margherita Pizza
1.description: Classic Italian pizza topped with tomato, mozzarella, and basil.

1.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
1.description: Pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.

1.name: Tiramisu
1.description: Traditional Italian dessert made with coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.

2.name: Butter Chicken
2.description: Creamy and flavorful Indian chicken dish cooked in a spiced tomato sauce. It is a type of curry made from chicken with a spiced tomato and butter (makhan) sauce.

2.name: Chicken Biryani
2.description: Fragrant rice dish layered with marinated chicken and spices, cooked to perfection.

2.name: Palak Paneer
2.description: Indian vegetarian dish made with spinach and paneer (Indian cottage cheese).

3.name: Dumplings
3.description: Steamed or fried dough filled with meat, vegetables, or seafood.

3.name: Mapo Tofu
3.description: Spicy Chinese dish made with tofu and minced meat, cooked in a flavorful sauce.

3.name: Kung Pao Chicken
3.description: Stir-fried chicken with peanuts, vegetables, and chili peppers.

4.name: Tacos al Pastor
4.description: Mexican tacos made with spit-grilled pork, pineapple, and onions.

4.name: Quesadillas
4.description: Mexican dish consisting of a tortilla filled with cheese and other ingredients, grilled or fried.

4.name: Chiles Rellenos
4.description: Mexican dish made of roasted poblano peppers stuffed with cheese, meat, or vegetables, then fried in an egg batter.

5.name: Green Curry
5.description: Thai curry made with green curry paste, coconut milk, meat or seafood, and vegetables.

5.name: Pad Thai
5.description: Thai stir-fried rice noodle dish with eggs, tofu, shrimp, peanuts, and bean sprouts.

5.name: Tom Yum Soup
5.description: Thai hot and sour soup flavored with lemongrass, lime, chili, and shrimp or chicken.

6.name: Cheeseburger
6.description: Classic American sandwich with a beef patty, cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles.

6.name: French Fries
6.description: Thin strips of potato deep-fried until crispy and golden brown.

6.name: BBQ Ribs
6.description: Slow-cooked pork ribs coated in barbecue sauce, tender and flavorful.

7.name: Sushi
7.description: Japanese dish consisting of vinegared rice topped with fish, seafood, or vegetables.

7.name: Ramen
7.description: Japanese noodle soup dish with broth, noodles, meat or tofu, and various toppings.

7.name: Tempura
7.description: Japanese dish of battered and deep-fried seafood or vegetables.

8.name: Hummus
8.description: Creamy dip made from mashed chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, and garlic.

8.name: Falafel
8.description: Deep-fried balls or patties made from ground chickpeas, herbs, and spices.

8.name: Gyro
8.description: Mediterranean dish of meat cooked on a vertical rotisserie, served wrapped in pita bread with tzatziki sauce.
